line_1: The kye stood rowtan i' the loan;
line_2: The bum-clock humm'd wi' lazy drone,

line_1: Be worthy then the sacred loan!
From fertile EGYPT, tho' the loan
line_2: They had not honesty to own.

line_1: With foolish rapture hug the trusted loan:
line_2: Bad bankers, vain of treasure not their own,

line_1: When neither bond or witness prove the loan,
line_2: But now a debt if some strange man should own,
